name: anomali-limo-threat-intel-feed
label: Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed
description:
Anomali Limo is a preconfigured set of intelligence feeds that STAXX users can access immediately upon download, and which offers indicators and insights spanning threat categories you need to secure your business. This connector facilitates automated interactions, such as returning the list of public, private, and shared collection resources to which the user has access, returning general information for a specific object of a specific collection, etc.

This connector has a dependency on the Threat Intel Management Solution Pack. Install the Solution Pack before enabling ingestion of Threat Feeds from this source.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: The URL of the Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.description: The username used to access the Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: password
fields.description: The password used to access the Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get API Root Information
operations.description: Returns information containing the title, description, TAXII versions, and maximum size of the content body for the specified TAXII server.

operations.title: Get Collections
operations.description: Returns the list of public, private, and shared collection resources to which the user has access.

parameters.title: Collection ID
parameters.name: collectionID
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) The ID of the collection whose general information such as ID, title, description, can_read, can_write, and media_types you want to retrieve from Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed.
parameters.description: (Optional) The ID of the collection whose general information such as ID, title, description, can_read, can_write, and media_types you want to retrieve from Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed.

operations.title: Get Objects By Collection ID
operations.description: Retrieves all available objects of a specific collection from Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed based on the collection ID and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Collection ID
parameters.name: collectionID
parameters.tooltip: The ID of the collection whose general information such as ID, title, description, can_read, can_write, and media_types you want to retrieve from Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed.
parameters.description: The ID of the collection whose general information such as ID, title, description, can_read, can_write, and media_types you want to retrieve from Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed.

parameters.title: Created After
parameters.name: added_after
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) The Datetime using which you want to filter the result set to only include only those items that have been created after the specified time.
parameters.description: (Optional) The Datetime using which you want to filter the result set to only include only those items that have been created after the specified time.

parameters.title: Process Response As
parameters.name: output_mode
options: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.tooltip: Select the method of returning the Feed Data information. You can choose between the data being create as Feed records in FortiSOAR or returned in the JSON format (Return as a JSON) or being written to a file on the FortiSOAR server (Save to File). If you choose the 'Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR' option, then in Record Creation Playbook IRI field, specify the IRI of the Create Record playbooks IRI, else if if you choose 'Save to File' option, then in the Filename field, specify the name of the file in which you want to save the feed information retrieved from Anomali Limo.
parameters.description: Select the method of returning the Feed Data information. You can choose between the data being create as Feed records in FortiSOAR or returned in the JSON format (Return as a JSON) or being written to a file on the FortiSOAR server (Save to File). If you choose the 'Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR' option, then in Record Creation Playbook IRI field, specify the IRI of the Create Record playbooks IRI, else if if you choose 'Save to File' option, then in the Filename field, specify the name of the file in which you want to save the feed information retrieved from Anomali Limo.

Save to File.title: Filename
Save to File.name: filename
Save to File.tooltip: The file will be created under /tmp

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) The offset value retrieves a subset of records that starts from the offset value. The offset works with the 'Limit' parameter, which determines how many records to retrieve starting from the offset.
parameters.description: (Optional) The offset value retrieves a subset of records that starts from the offset value. The offset works with the 'Limit' parameter, which determines how many records to retrieve starting from the offset.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) The maximum number of results that this operation should return. If the 'Limit' is not specified, all objects in the specified collection are retrieved.
parameters.description: (Optional) The maximum number of results that this operation should return. If the 'Limit' is not specified, all objects in the specified collection are retrieved.

operations.description: Generates output schema for other actions based on the input configuration
operations.title: Get Output Schema
Get Object By Object ID
operations.description: Returns general information for a specific object of a specific collection from Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed based on the collection ID and object ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Collection ID
parameters.name: collectionID
parameters.tooltip: The ID of the collection that contains the object whose general information you want to retrieve from Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed.
parameters.description: The ID of the collection that contains the object whose general information you want to retrieve from Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed.

parameters.title: Object ID
parameters.name: objectID
parameters.tooltip: The ID of the object whose general information you want to retrieve from Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed.
parameters.description: The ID of the object whose general information you want to retrieve from Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed.

operations.title: Get Manifest By Collection ID
operations.description: Returns manifest information about all available objects of a specific collection from Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed based on the collection ID and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Collection ID
parameters.name: collectionID
parameters.tooltip: The ID of the collection whose manifest information you want to retrieve from Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed.
parameters.description: The ID of the collection whose manifest information you want to retrieve from Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed.

parameters.title: Added After
parameters.name: added_after
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) The Datetime using which you want to filter the result set to only include only those items that are added after the specified time.
parameters.description: (Optional) The Datetime using which you want to filter the result set to only include only those items that are added after the specified time.
